note:
I ♥ the open web. Film photographer and mediocre darkroom printer. Maker of sometimes interesting things. Coder of open source curiosities. Always exploring.

PhD candidate and DM Design and Innovation Fellow @ Weatherhead School of Management at Case Western Reserve University. Currently researching creativity, innovation and the role of cognitive conflict in software engineering teams.

☕ powered, 👪 driven, living tiny 🐤🦆🐢🐇🐹🦜🐝 farm existence.
